reviewText:
It is so funny that they grouped these two movies together. Those two are very similar types of movies. I found them very boring and tasteless. The plots are just too simple. I believe JW and the director(s) tried to search the humane side of the western movies. But this just failed.

I think JW produced too many movies and some of them are of low quality. I prefer his early movies, such as Stagecoach, etc. There are many better ones, just not these two.

I am a John Wayne fan and collect his movies.  The excellent picture quality of Blue Ray on a LED HD TV just enhances the movies by allowing the stunning scenery in both pictures to be fully appreciated.  True Grit was filmed mostly on National Forests in Colorado and  the Searchers has alot of Monument Valley Arizona in it, so there is much to be enjoyed along with the storoy and actors.
Just a pair of fantastic western movies. it is a must keep set if you don't own these movies yet. !!!True Grit / Searchers [Blu-ray]
John Wayne is my all time favorite actor and these are two of his great movies.  I have played them several times.
Definitely two off our favorite John Wayne. Two Blu Ray films in one package is a great deal.
Its is classic Duke. Enough said.
Two BluRay classics at a great price!
One of the great movies I've seen.
Two of the best John Wayne movies.  Two of the best Westerns ever.  Very reasonable price for two blue-rays.  Excellent buy.
GREAT DUKE DOUBLE FEATURE ON BLU THE SEACHERS LOOKS LIKE IT WAS LIVE BOTH ARE GREAT TOO BAD DUKE WAYNE DIDNT LIVE LONG ENOUGH TO SEE HIS FILMS LOOKING SO GOOD
